img.title: Jolene and Dan Greve

h3.a: 2018 Citizens of the Year: The entire Mayfield Family congratulates Jolene and Dan Greve

div.span: Jolene and Dan Greve have helped to shape our schools and community, not for honors or accolodades but because it is simply... who they are.

As aresult of the continued spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19), Mayfield City Schools top priority is to maintain the health and safety of our students, staff and community. We have gathered information on this page about the coronavirus (COVID-19), as well as communication updates from the Mayfield City Schools and links to local, state, and national resources.
